Mostly a military base disguised as a town, located on Friendship Hwy. Most groups traveling by Land Cruiser to/from the border with
spend a night here. No public transportation available here.
Walking - Tingri is located on edge of flat plain so lots of land around town to go trekking
Minimart to the west side of town

Restaurants available in the vicinity of the two hotels. Most guesthouses offer tea along with momos and potatoes for a few yuan. The best restaurant in town is the Sichuan restaurant across from the Lao Dengre Hotel.

.

since they have very nice Tibetan teahouses with carpeted floors and low to the floor seating.
